title: Pharaoh's Curse
desc:
Post 1420
- Choose a player.
- They draw **Cursed Totem.**
_ _
Cursed Totem (<:trinket:1141745128898310144>)
- On your turn, you have a 33% chance to draw a card.
- This card is ❄️ Frozen. (I know <:trinket:1141745128898310144> cards can't be frozen, just apply how frozen works but to how you can discard trinkets)
